name: Dream Drifters (Standalone)
description:
Controls: Click / Space bar to Fly. Yup, that's it

You've entered a deep dream taking you into the Dreamscape and infinite realm for you to explore. As you drift you'll encounter Nightmares that will try to end your dreams so be sure to dodge them. How deep can you travel?

In this casual infinite runner, you'll drift through an infinite path and dodge incoming enemies. Take a step back from being awake and drift for a while.

= Features =
Simple one-touch controls. Easy to learn, hard to master. The further you travel the harder the path gets. Earn extra points for flying close to the edge of dreams.

★ Colorful and vivid graphics with smooth gameplay
★ Procedurally generated path
★ Unlock over 40+ Color Palettes 🎨
★ Avoid Nightmares and fly near the edges to earn extra points
★ Collect powerups that will aid you

= Play 4 different Game Modes =
🌙 Classic. The way the game is meant to be played. 3 Hp, powerups on, and revive on.
⚡ Survival. You have limited energy. Collect power packs to keep your journey going. Revive on and no powerups.
🌌 Zen. A worry-free mode for you to play when you feel like relaxing. No Nightmares, no scores, no coins, and no powerups. Just you and the infinite Dreamscape.
💀 Nightmare. For those that are searching for a true challenge. 1 Hp, no powerups, no revive.
